changeSet.author: ahmsay
changeSet.sql:
insert into payment(id, customer_id, total_price) values (nextval('payment_seq'), 1, 250), (nextval('payment_seq'), 2, 3), (nextval('payment_seq'), 3, 70.2);
insert into payment_product(payment_id, product_id, quantity, name, price) values (1, 1, 1, 'Lol', 25), (2, 2, 1, 'asd', 3), (3, 2, 3, 'zxc', 23.4);
